description: This method detects mimikatz keywords in different Eventlogs (some of them only appear in older Mimikatz version that are however still used by different threat groups)
author: Florian Roth (rule)
David ANDRE (additional keywords)
false_positives: Files with Mimikatz in their filename
name: Mimikatz Use
query: (((*dpapi::masterkey*) OR (*eo.oe.kiwi*) OR (*event::clear*) OR (*event::drop*) OR (*gentilkiwi.com*) OR (*kerberos::golden*) OR (*kerberos::ptc*) OR (*kerberos::ptt*) OR (*kerberos::tgt*) OR (*Kiwi Legit Printer*) OR (*lsadump::*) OR (*mimidrv.sys*) OR (*\mimilib.dll*) OR (*misc::printnightmare*) OR (*misc::shadowcopies*) OR (*misc::skeleton*) OR (*privilege::backup*) OR (*privilege::debug*) OR (*privilege::driver*) OR (*sekurlsa::*)) AND (NOT winlog.event_id:"15"))
